results.adx_keywords: Deaths (Obituaries);Music;Pop and Rock Music;Bacharach, Burt;David, Hal;Warwick, Dionne;Costello, Elvis
results.title: Burt Bacharach, Composer Who Added a High Gloss to the ’60s, Dies at 94
results.abstract: His sophisticated collaborations with the lyricist Hal David — “The Look of Love,” “Walk On By,” “Alfie” and many more hits — evoked a sleek era of airy romance.

media.caption: Burt Bacharach in 1965. His effervescent compositions defined sophisticated hedonism for a generation of young people amid the tumult of the 1960s.

results.byline: By Edward Wong and Julian E. Barnes
results.title: Chinese Balloon Had Tools to Collect Electronic Communications, U.S. Says
results.abstract: China’s surveillance balloons have flown over more than 40 countries and are directed by the Chinese military, the State Department said. The F.B.I. is studying debris.
des_facet: United States Defense and Military Forces

media.caption: This picture provided by the U.S. Navy shows sailors recovering a Chinese high-altitude surveillance balloon off the coast of South Carolina.

results.adx_keywords: Education (K-12);School Discipline (Students);Special Education;Disabilities;Civil Rights and Liberties;Discrimination;United States Politics and Government;internal-storyline-no;Education Department (US);Justice Department
results.title: How Educators Secretly Remove Students With Disabilities From School
results.abstract: Known as informal removals, the tactics are “off-the-book” suspensions often in violation of federal civil rights protections for those with disabilities.

media.caption: Dakotah LaVigne’s tumultuous educational journey has been marked by a series of tactics, known as informal removals, that schools secretly use to remove challenging students with disabilities from class.

results.byline: By Maggie Haberman and Glenn Thrush
results.title: Pence Gets Subpoena From Special Counsel in Jan. 6 Investigation
results.abstract: The move by Jack Smith, the special counsel, is one of the most aggressive in his investigation of Donald Trump’s efforts to stay in power and is likely to lead to a battle over executive privilege.

media.caption: Former Vice President Mike Pence is one of the people best positioned to provide information about former President Donald J. Trump’s state of mind as he sought to overturn his election loss.

results.title: Do I Need to Avoid Dark Chocolate Now?
